column8:
This design admire's the incredible challenges that must be overcome to escape Earth's gravitational field.

I have used the Saturn V in my design as it is the largest object ever to have escaped the earth's field. Weighing in at a staggering 3 million kilograms, also staggering was the amount of thrust it produced: 7.5 million pounds!
